name: Best Magnitude Prediction
description: Optimized for maximum magnitude prediction range (1.52)
tuning_notes:
This configuration achieved the highest magnitude prediction range (1.52) by:
- Increasing frequency_scale_init from 10.0 to 15.0
- Increasing frequency_bias_init from 2.0 to 3.0
- Increasing scaling_lr_multiplier from 20 to 25
- Increasing scaling_wd_multiplier from 3 to 6
- Keeping magnitude_weight at 2.0 for strong magnitude focus
